statements.query: MATCH (:EC2Subnet)<-[:PART_OF_SUBNET]-(n:NetworkInterface) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:NetworkInterface)-[r:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
